QuestData.Title: Rites of the Earthmother
QuestData.Description: Today, you have undertaken a rite of passage far more difficult than we ask of most of our youths. Be proud. Now, it is time for you to continue on your journey.$B$BTo the west, beyond our burial ground, you will find a path winding up the mesa. Follow it to the top, and speak with Dyami Windsoar.$B$BWalk with the Earth Mother, friend. You will always be welcome here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Dyami Windsoar atop Fargaze Mesa.
QuestData.RewardText: If you are prepared to leave Camp Narache behind, I will help call the spirits to guide you onwards.
